Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, just south of Regalia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: To the east is the magnificent Shrine of the Protectors. Although there is no particular clerical order which oversees the shrine, it is maintained at public expense for all the citizens of Oceancrest. They may come to pray or ask for protection from whatever god they happen to belive in. It all comes out the same, right? To the west is the Oceancrest Public Amphitheatre, a place where bard and minstrels entertain. The entrance is located on either Regalia Drive or Nagaritha Drive.
